InstallEventAddRoutes.summary: NOTE Experimental The addRoutes() method of the interface specifies one or more static routes, which define rules for fetching specified resources that will be used even before service worker startup. This allows you to, for example, bypass a service worker in cases where you always want to fetch a resource from the network or a browser , and avoids the performance overhead of unnecessary service worker cycles.

remarks.para:
-
-install event
-Service Worker API
-Use the Service Worker Static Routing API to bypass the service worker for specific paths on developer.chrome.com (2024)
